author: Sanya Mansoor
title: Gun Shops Can Sell Firearms From Parking Lots and Offer Drive-Thru Services During COVID-19 Pandemic: Justice Department
description: Gun retailers can still offer curbside services to sell guns and ammunition amid the coronavirus pandemic, federal authorities say.
content:
Gun retailers can still offer curbside services to sell guns and ammunition to customers amid the coronavirus pandemic, the U.S. Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives (ATF) announced in an industry letter published Friday.
